name: AWS Deployer
description: Deploy and keep track of deployments using AWS CodePipeline and ECR.

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID from the GitHub OAuth application.

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret from the GitHub OAuth application.

GITHUB_TEAM_ID.description: The ID of the GitHub team that will be allowed to access this application.

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region that contains the CodePipeline pipelines and ECR repository.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The access key ID for the AWS Deployer IAM user.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret access key for the AWS Deployer IAM user.

STAGING_PIPELINE.description: The name of the staging CodePipeline pipeline.

PRODUCTION_PIPELINE.description: The name of the production CodePipeline pipeline.

IMAGE_REPOSITORY.description: The name of the ECR repository.
